question: Who is the head of the committee constituted to investigate the fire incident happened in Assam’s Baghjan oil well?
explanation:
The National Green Tribunal has imposed an interim penalty of Rs 25 crore on Oil India, for failing to stop fire in Assam’s Baghjan oil well.
The well was leaking gas uncontrollably for nearly 27 days and it caught fire on June 9, which killed two of the PSU’s firefighters. Recently, a bench comprising Justice S P Wangdi and expert member Siddhanta Das constituted a committee headed by former high court judge B P Katakey to investigate the matter and submit a report.
